text:
Good evening everyone! There will be no attendance code this evening - *please go to your TA groups,* the entire class time this evening will be devoted to assignment work! Let's finish out unit 2 strong :muscle: thank you all for the great work you've put in for the past few months! *If all of your assignments have been completed and demo'd then you do not need to attend class this evening!*I

This is a reminder that I will be checking the Canvas grades tomorrow at *9 A.M.* Every learner who has received a 1/1 on all assignments will *automatically be enrolled in Liftoff*. However, if a learner does not have any of the four assignments (#1-#4) graded 1/1 then they will be withdrawn from the class Slack Workspace tomorrow and removed from the course.

I'll be around until 8:30 CST this evening if there are any questions!
